overview: Forty years after her death, Golda Meir's image is still polarising and clouded by controversy. While perceived as a feminist icon in many places in the world, in the country she led as Prime Minister for five years she's regarded by many as a failure.  Delicately stitching together archival footage and interviews, Madam Prime Minister invites the viewers to walk in Meirâ€™s iconic shoes and reexamine her groundbreaking and dramatic years as the first and only female prime minister of Israel.
title: Madam Prime Minister
